Column.Name: File No.
Type
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND([Conduct Money]!=NULL(), $thisValue !=NULL()), TRUE, [Conduct Money] = NULL(), True, "Type is mandatory if Conduct Money is not empty")

Column.Name: Prev Ref RecordID
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND([Previously Served]= "Yes", $thisValue !=NULL()), TRUE, [Previously Served] <> "Yes", True, "Prev Ref No. is required if Previously Served is yes")

To
Column.Formula:
LET $emails := EACH[Responsible Party Email];
RETURN ARRAY_JOIN($emails, ", ")
